title: Ep. 400 - America's Original Sin
description:
Democratic congresswoman Rashida Tlaib gets into a fight with Israel, Trump proposes buying Greenland, and Planned Parenthood threatens to defund itself. Then, the NYT calls us all racist. Date: 08-19-2019
